definition: large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout

sentences.english: Other factories have spread like wild flowers among what were once rice fields and fish farms.
sentences.chinese: 大量的廠房像野花一樣盛開在原來的稻田和漁場之上。

sentences.english: Environmental characteristic of walleye pollock fishing ground in high seas of the okhotsk sea in summer.
sentences.chinese: 夏季鄂霍茨克海公海區狹鱈漁場環境特徵。

sentences.english: When did the aquatic fishing ground begin cultivating organically ?
sentences.chinese: 漁場從何年開始按有機方式養殖？

sentences.english: The area called the grand banks was the most abundant fishing ground in the world.
sentences.chinese: 號稱大淺灘的海域是當時世界上產魚最多的漁場。

sentences.english: Green lake is rich in fish pool lake, is a rich natural fishing grounds.
sentences.chinese: 翠湖有豐富的魚池湖，是一個豐富的天然漁場。

sentences.english: These circular pens are fifty meters wide and covered with netting to keep out seabirds.
sentences.chinese: 這些圓形的漁場寬50米，用網覆蓋來防止海鳥。

sentences.english: The Rivers Tay and Tweed are major salmon fisheries.
sentences.chinese: 泰河與特威德河是蘇格蘭兩個主要的三文魚漁場。

sentences.english: Sakhalin islanders discover debris dumped in shallow bay fisheries.
sentences.chinese: 庫頁島居民發現了在淺水灣漁場的拋棄垃圾的痕跡。

sentences.english: The owner of the fishery shook his fist at the fire.
sentences.chinese: 漁場主對着大火揮舞着拳頭。

sentences.english: But the fishery was confronted with a financial crisis.
sentences.chinese: 但漁場面臨着財政的危機。

sentences.english: The anchovy fisheries will stay closed, by EU order.
sentences.chinese: 根據歐盟的規定，鳳尾魚漁場將依然關閉。

definition: Kenting National Park on the Hengchun Peninsula 恆春半島|恒春半岛[Heng2 chun1 Ban4 dao3], Pingtung county, south Taiwan
pinyin: Ken3 ding1 Guo2 jia1 Gong1 yuan2

definition: grouper (Portuguese: garoupa)/also called 鮨/Epinephelinae (subfamily of Serranidae, fish family including grouper)
to fish for (aquatic animals and plants)/to catch
Kagoshima, Japanese island prefecture off the south coast of Kyushu
a hot tourist attraction/a tourist trap
